story_stone_01_03000/2401_1201_0100_10:
So we need to look for these fascinating stones
that have similar properties to sync stones.
story_stone_01_03000/2401_1201_0200_10:
I don’t think I’ve ever come across anything like
that during my fossil hunts.
story_stone_01_03000/2401_1201_0300_10:
Same here. If there were any rare ores on Pasio,
one of us would’ve spotted them right away.
story_stone_01_03000/2401_1201_0400_10: These stones are mysterious, like ghost Pokémon...
story_stone_01_03000/2401_1201_0500_10:
If I ever put them on display at my museum, I’ll
label them “ghost stones”!
